articles.title: Beyoncé blamed for inflation surprise in Sweden - BBC
articles.description: The frenzy stoked by the start of the singer's world tour is seen driving up prices in Sweden.
articles.content:
Thought the war in Ukraine or supply chain snarls were to blame for rising prices? You must not know 'bout Beyoncé.
The start of the singer's world tour in Sweden last month sparked such a frenzy of… [+2109 chars]

articles.description: The combined company would overtake both EE and O2 in market share. The UK's third and fourth operators by market share have today announced their...
articles.content: The UK's third and fourth operators by market share have today announced their intention to merge. We're talking about Vodafone and Three. The combined company would leapfrog past both EE (the curren… [+1842 chars]
